spec_data.Name: uim-devel
spec_data.License: BSD and LGPLv2+ and (BSD or LGPLv2)
spec_data.Description:
Uim is a multilingual input method library. Uim aims to
provide secure and useful input methods for all
languages.

This package contains the header files and the libraries which is
needed for developing Uim applications.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 08:19:08 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Development files for the Uim library
